title: [Completed] Scheduled Maintenance - Patch 5.4 - 26/02/2015
body:
Summoners,

On 26/02/2015, starting at 03:30 AM AEDT, ranked queues will be disabled in preparation for patch 5.4. At 05:00 AM AEDT, the servers will be shut down and all games currently in progress will end in a draw and stats will not be recorded.

We estimate the battlegrounds will be unavailable for 6 hours.

This patch is approximately 375MB

If you experience any bugs or issues be sure to post them in our Mega Thread for the team to investigate.

http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/8vLe5Lrd-patch-54-bugs-megathread

-ToxicHawk

replies.body: Hey is patch live? I open client and just get a black screen in patcher which wont change, anyone else got this/ideas?

> [{quoted}](name=Spaghini,realm=OCE,application-id=3fteLeTW,discussion-id=64nuof7u,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-02-25T21:46:12.159+0000)
>
> Hey is patch live? I open client and just get a black screen in patcher which wont change, anyone else got this/ideas?

Hey Spaghini,
Yes this patch is compelted and live. If you are getting a black screen it could be upating in the background OR your client could be having issues connecting to the servers.
I would suggest leaving it for a little while (5 min or so) and see if the patcher then updates and refreshes.
If not try rebooting your computer and modem/router then try patching again.

Let me know how it goes.

-ToxicHawk
I'm going to reply to this 2 months later to say - yes it worked. huehuehue trolling rito dont ban plz

I uninstalled LoL and re-install LoL. 

After constantly waiting for the game to complete installation, either my PC crashes or the LoL Patcher messages me saying "update failure". Now the installation is stopped at 99%. Even if I try to re-update it again, it's still gonna give me another hour to get it complete without any interruption.
Hey, Why my FPS become low and low?{{item:3070}}

Hello,

I have this bug that when i join a game, i cant get in to it. I get the game crash pop up. I have restarted my pc and that didn't fix the bug. Now i'm an afk player ingame and i can't do anything about it..

Do you have any tips?

Mvg,

Bochzo

> [{quoted}](name=Bochzo,realm=EUW,application-id=3fteLeTW,discussion-id=64nuof7u,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-02-25T11:03:50.968+0000)
>
> Hello,
> 
> I have this bug that when i join a game, i cant get in to it. I get the game crash pop up. I have restarted my pc and that didn't fix the bug. Now i'm an afk player ingame and i can't do anything about it..
> 
> Do you have any tips?
> 
> Mvg,
> 
> Bochzo

I would try completing a repair on your client and if that fails it may require an uninstall and reinstall.
So... I gather DJ Sona is coming out in this update then?
